$:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/ControlPan.caption: ItonNote
$:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/ControlPan.text:
These settings let you customise the behaviour of ItonNote plugin.

---

!! Appearance

$:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/ControlPan.title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/ControlPanel
$:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/ControlPan.text:
!! 设置 Settings

!!! 作为文件目录中根文件夹的笔记的标题 
Title of the notes as the root folder in the file tree

以这个标题作为标签的其它笔记相当于放入了根文件夹中：

Other notes with this title as a tag are equivalent to being placed in the root folder:

虚拟根文件夹：
<$edit-text
	tiddler="$:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/Configs/SideBarFolderMenuBaseTitle"
	tag="input"
	default="Index"
	placeholder="" />

$:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/Help/TW-Lo.title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/Help/TW-Locator基于标签生成的文件夹目录结构使用方法
$:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/Help/TW-Lo.text:
侧边栏的「目录结构」标签页里展示了[[通过标签系统自动生成|$:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/Help/在 TiddlyWiki 中使用虚拟文件夹]]的文件夹。

第一个目录树根据`当前所在的条目`展示，是动态的；第二个目录树从`Index(根文件夹)`条目出发，是静态的。因Echart动态显示上下文的图没有这种树的形式好看且干扰注意力。所以暂用目录树的形式显示上下文。

若想修改根文件夹，请打开[[设置|$:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/ControlPanel]]。

* 打了 A 标签，即相当于将文件存储在文件夹 A 中，并以 A 的内容作为文件夹的 Readme
* 在任意Tiddler中使用「创建一个标签为此条目名称的新条目」按钮，可以创建以当前Tiddler为文件夹的文件
* 点击 `>` 按钮（使它变成 `v`）可以展开文件夹
* 直接点击文件夹的名字可以查看这个文件夹的 Readme
* 分割线上方是当前目录，再往上是上级目录，点击分割线上方的上级目录名左侧的 `>` 按钮可以回到上级目录
* 当处在 A 文件夹内时，点击分割线下方的 `+` 可以在当前文件夹里创建新文件（即创建打了 A 标签的新 Tiddler）
* 点击 Filter by fields 可以展开分面搜索工具，点击分面搜索工具内的 `+` 可以增加筛选条件，点击 `x` 㐓减少筛选条件。

---

The folder structure [[auto-generated by tag system|$:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/Help/在 TiddlyWiki 中使用虚拟文件夹]] is shown in the "Directory structure" tab in the sidebar.

The first directory tree is displayed according to the `currently located entry` and is dynamic; the second directory tree starts from the `Index(root folder)` entry and is static. Because Echart's dynamic display of contextual diagrams is not as nice and distracting as this tree form. So for now, the context is displayed in the form of a directory tree.

If you want to modify the root folder, please open the [[Settings|$:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/ControlPanel]].

* tagged with A, which is equivalent to storing the file in folder A and using the contents of A as the Readme of the folder
* Use the "Create a new tiddler with this tag name" button in any Tiddler to create a file with the current Tiddler as the folder
* Click the `>` button (to make it `v`) to expand the folder
* Click directly on the name of a folder to see the Readme of that folder
* Click the `>` button to the left of the parent directory name above the split line to go back to the parent directory.
* When you are in the A folder, click `+` below the split line to create a new file in the current folder (i.e. create a new Tiddler with the A tag)
* Click Filter by fields to expand the faceted search tool, click `+` inside the faceted search tool to increase the filtering criteria, click `x` can decrease the filtering criteria.

$:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/Help/在 Tid.title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/Help/在 TiddlyWiki 中使用虚拟文件夹
$:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/Help/在 Tid.text:
!!! Tag

The Tag structure can be thought of as a folder directory structure with soft links to form a graphical structure, since Tag relationships are inherently free, and two notes can be tagged to each other and parented to each other in the folder structure.

Using tw-locator, you can create a "file directory" tab in the sidebar, which shows the folder structure generated by the tag. The details are written in [[$:/plugins/bimlas/locator/README/macros]], and the plugin should have it pre-populated in [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/Sidebar/FolderMenu]], which can be used immediately or modified to override it.

Then you can set the "File Directory" tab to be displayed by default in `$:/ControlPanel` -> "Settings" -> "Default Sidebar Tab", so that you can use TiddlyWiki as a folder system. And the plugin should already be pre-configured for this.

!!! Slash

TiddlyWiki comes with a way to create folders by using slashes in the header.

The various folders that come with the system can be seen via the sidebar under "More" -> "Explore".

If you use the NodeJS version of TiddlyWiki, these tiddlers will also be placed in the corresponding folders on the real file system.

<$list filter="[<lang>search:title[zh]]" variable="lang">

欢迎使用''【太微中文社区插件源】''！

本插件源是由[[太微(TiddlyWiki)中文社区|https://github.com/tiddly-gittly]]维护的、致力于搜集网络上所有与 ~TiddlyWiki5 有关插件的、希望为中国以及全世界的太微用户提供一键安装、更新插件体验的公开插件源。

如果还不了解该如何使用太微和本插件源，欢迎阅读[[中文社区共建的太微（TiddlyWiki）教程|https://tw-cn.netlify.app]]里插件相关的部分。如上提到的插件源和教程皆为开源项目，你可以在 [[GitHub|https://github.com/tiddly-gittly]] 中找到并参与贡献！如果乐意，可以通过QQ群等方式加入我们，详情请见如上提到的中文教程。

要添加这个插件库到你的 Wiki 中，只需鼠标拖动这个链接到你的 Wiki 里即可：<$link to=<<currentTiddler>>>{{!!caption}}</$link>

注意：本插件源版本为 ~GitHub Page 的版本，更新更快，但是可能需要科学上网手段。如果你在国内，而且不清楚什么是“科学上网”，请选用另一个经过 netlify.app 加速的[[版本|$:/config/ChinesePluginLibrary/Netlify]]，虽然更新有一定的延迟，但对国内用户更加友好。

</$list>

<$list filter="[<lang>!search:title[zh]]" variable="lang">

Welcome to the ''[TiddlyWiki Chinese Community Plugin Source]''!

This plugin source is maintained by the [[TiddlyWiki Chinese Community]] and is dedicated to collecting all TiddlyWiki5 related plugins on the web, hoping to provide a one-click installation and update plugin experience for TiddlyWiki users in China and around the world.

If you don't know how to use TiddlyWiki and this source, you are welcome to read the plugins related section in the [[TiddlyWiki Tutorials for Chinese Communities|https://tw-cn.netlify.app]]. As mentioned above, both the plugin source and the tutorial are open source projects, you can find them in [[GitHub|https://github.com/tiddly-gittly]] and participate in contributing! If you like, you can join us through QQ groups and other means, see the Chinese tutorials mentioned above for details.

To add this plugin library to your Wiki, just drag this link with your mouse into your Wiki: <$link to=<<currentTiddler>>{{!!caption}}</$link>

Note: The source version of this plugin is the ~GitHub Page version, which is faster to update, but may require scientific Internet access. If you are in China and are not sure what GFW is, please use another [[version|$:/config/ChinesePluginLibrary/Netlify]] that is accelerated by netlify.app, although there is a certain delay in updating, but it is more friendly to domestic users more friendly.

</$list>
</$list>

$:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/Startup/el.creator: LinOnetwo

$:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/UI/PageCon.title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/UI/PageControlBelowPage
$:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/UI/PageCon.text:
<!-- Though visually it is on the bottom of the page, but we have to use AboveStory to make sure it is overlay on the story. -->
<$list filter="[[$:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/settings/PageControlBelowPage]get[text]else[no]match[yes]]">
  <nav class="page-control-below-page">
    {{$:/core/ui/PageTemplate/pagecontrols}}
  </nav>
</$list>

$:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/UI/style.c.title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/UI/style.css
$:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/UI/style.c.text:
<$importvariables filter="[[$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/base]]">

.page-control-below-page {
  display: none;

  padding: 10px;
  background-color: white;
  -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(10px);

  position: fixed;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  z-index: 100;
  width: 100%;
}
.page-control-below-page .tc-page-controls {
  margin: 0;

  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-evenly;
}

@media (max-width: <<sidebarbreakpoint>>) {
  .page-control-below-page {
    display: block;
  }
}

$:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/descriptio.title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/description
$:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/descriptio.text:
!!! TW-Locator

根据[[$:/plugins/bimlas/locator/README/macros]]创建了下列文件：

* [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/Sidebar/Locator Fields]] 侧边栏的 Fields 标签页，用于查看含有各种字段的Tiddlers
* [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/Sidebar/SearchResultByFacets]] 搜索结果中的 Facets 标签页，用于分面搜索
* [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/Sidebar/SearchResultByFields]] 搜索结果中的 Fields 标签页，用于按字段进行精准搜索

!!! macros

!!!! TransclusionWithEditMe

[[$:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/Macros/TransclusionWithEditMe]] Usage:

使用普通的 [[Transclusion|https://tiddlywiki.com/#Transclusion]] 时，你没法得知源文件在哪里，如果想要修改内容，还得打开编辑模式、复制被引用的 Tiddler 的标题，然后搜索打开编辑，比较麻烦。

使用此宏进行引用就很方便了：

```tid
<<reuse-tiddler "快速创建新笔记按钮">>
```

会直接在引用的区块旁边显示一个「查看引文」的小浮窗，带有指向源文件的链接，直接点开编辑即可。

!!!! OpenImageInGithub

[[$:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/Macros/OpenImageInGithub]] Usage:

If you have `webcatalog-tiddlywiki-menu-app.jpg` in your Wiki, you normally can just `{{webcatalog-tiddlywiki-menu-app.jpg}}` to place it in your tiddler, but you can use this macro to make it clickable, and open large image in the new browser tab:

```tid
<<view-big-image webcatalog-tiddlywiki-menu-app.jpg>>
```

!!! snippets（文本片段）

在编辑模式下，有一个图章按钮，点击后会列出一系列文本片段，可以一键添加预制内容，因而无需用脑记住这些复杂的文本片段了。

本插件预置了一些文本片段，详见相应的 Macros 的介绍，或相应的插件的介绍：

* [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/Snippets/LocatorAboutCurrentTiddler]]
* [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/Snippets/OpenImageInGithub]]
* [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/Snippets/TransclusionWithEditMe]]

$:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/readme.title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/readme
$:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/readme.text:
!! 功能

预配置了一系列琐碎的内容，一般来自各插件的Readme和论坛讨论，但大多数人懒得看Readme，故在此直接帮忙配置好了。

具体预置内容介绍可见[[Description|$:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/description]]。

{{$:/plugins/linonetwo/itonnote/ControlPanel}}
